name: T.G. Cyber Magician
text: When using this card you control as a Synchro Material for a "T.G." Synchro Monster, you can use "T.G." monsters in your hand as non-Tuner Synchro Materials. During the End Phase, if this card is in the Graveyard because it was destroyed on the field and sent there this turn: You can add 1 "T.G." monster from your Deck to your hand, except "T.G. Cyber Magician".
